nuggets.place_description: Right-click to place. Ctrl + Scroll to adjust the maximum placement distance.
nuggets.move_horizontal_description: Hold Control + Scroll to move in the direction you are facing.
nuggets.move_vertical_description: Hold Control + Scroll to move up and down.
nuggets.rotate_description: Hold Control + Scroll to rotate the structure 90 degrees.
nuggets.print_description: Places the structure in the world. (Creative Only)
nuggets.confirm_description: Dismisses the management tool and keeps the visual in the world.
nuggets.delete_description: Deletes the visual and closes the GUI.
nuggets.mirror_description: Hold Control + Scroll to mirror the structure.
nuggets.expand_box: Hold Control + Scroll to adjust the boundary
